TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl
Public MustInherit Class WebZone Inherits CompositeControl

summary.span: 做為在 Web 組件應用程式中當做伺服器控制項容器之所有控制項 (包括 Web 組件 控制項、伺服器控制項和使用者控制項) 的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all controls that act as containers for server controls (including Web Parts controls, server controls, and user controls) in Web Parts applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件區域是定義在網頁上包含伺服器控制項，並提供一致的使用者介面 (UI)、 配置和轉譯為包含的控制項。A Web Parts zone is a defined region that contains server controls on a Web page, and provides a consistent user interface (UI), layout, and rendering for the contained controls. 區域在瀏覽器中轉譯為 HTML 表格。Zones are rendered in a browser as HTML tables. 類別是所有 Web 組件區域的基底類別。The class is the base class for all Web Parts zones. 區域控制項是複合控制項，設計成包含作為其他控制項，因此類別繼承自類別。A zone control is a composite control designed to contain other controls, hence the class inherits from the class. 搭配控制項和控制項 （或其他使用者或伺服器控制項，可在區域中放置），區域控制項衍生自基底類別形成 Web 組件應用程式的基本建置組塊。Together with the control and controls (or other user or server controls that can be placed in zones), zone controls derived from the base class form the essential building blocks of a Web Parts application. 若要啟用完整的 Web 組件功能，以包含的控制項是重要的角色的 Web 組件區域。A critical role of Web Parts zones is to enable full Web Parts functionality for the controls they contain. 每個 Web 組件頁面包含至少一個區域，和區域可以包含零或多個組件控制項。Every Web Parts page contains at least one zone, and a zone can contain zero or more part controls. 區域所需的 Web 組件功能。Zones are required for Web Parts functionality. 沒有區域，即使控制項衍生自類別可以有很少的 Web 組件功能。Without zones, even controls that derive from the class can have very little Web Parts functionality. 相反地，Web 組件控制項集合的設計，因為可以將一般 ASP.NET 控制項、 伺服器控制項或使用者控制項區域 (其衍生自)，並透過在該區域，這些一般的伺服器控制項是做為啟用控制項在執行階段。Conversely, because of the design of the Web Parts control set, you can place ordinary ASP.NET controls, server controls, or user controls into a zone (which derives from ), and by virtue of being in the zone, these ordinary server controls are enable to act as controls at run time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件類別。For details, see the documentation for the class. > [!NOTE] > 您可新增或頁面區域外,，但在此情況下，它們只是當做一般的伺服器控制項的控制項。It is possible to add or controls to a page outside of a zone, but in that case they simply function as ordinary server controls. 有兩大類的集合中的 Web 組件控制項的集合，全部都是繼承自基底類別。There are two broad categories of zones in the Web Parts control set, all of which inherit from the base class. - 區域。 zones. 這些包含（和其他伺服器和使用者） 控制項，並形成大部分的情況下與使用者互動的主要 UI 的 Web 組件頁面。These contain (and other server and user) controls, and form the primary UI of Web Parts pages that users interact with most of the time. - 區域。 zones. 這些區域提供的 Web 組件頁面的特殊檢視，可讓使用者修改 （個人） 內容、 配置、 外觀、 行為以及所包含的控制項屬性Web 組件頁面上的區域。These zones provide special views of a Web Parts page that enable users to modify (personalize) the content, layout, appearance, behavior, and properties of controls contained in zones on a Web Parts page. 例如，區域是提供 頁面上，讓使用者加入和移除伺服器控制項的類別目錄檢視。For example, a zone is a that provides a catalog view of a page, enabling users to add and remove server controls. 區域是另一種提供一種編輯檢視的頁面上，讓使用者能修改，並編輯的頁面上，以及內容、 外觀和行為的控制項的配置。An zone is another type of that provides an editing view of a page, enabling users to modify and edit the layout of the page, along with the properties, appearance, and behavior of the controls. 每個區域中 Web 組件控制項集合設計成包含對應的控制項類型衍生自類別，做為區域的主要內容和主要 UI 的組件控制項。Each zone in the Web Parts control set is designed to contain a corresponding type of control derived from the class, with the part controls serving as the main content and primary UI of the zone. 下表中，會顯示 Web 組件控制項集合，以及其所包含的類型還要中的區域類型。Zone types in the Web Parts control set, along with the corresponding types of part controls they contain, are shown in the following table. |組件控制項類型Part control type|區域類型Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| | (和伺服器和使用者控制項，各加上方在執行階段) (and server and user controls, which are wrapped with a at run time)| (基底類別是) (the base class is )| | (提供數個衍生的控制項自訂 Web 組件控制項集合，與控制項可以開發) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基底類別是) (the base class is )| | (提供數個衍生的控制項自訂 Web 組件控制項集合，與控制項可以開發) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基底類別是) (the base class is )| | （連線控制項是唯一的因為它們並非繼承自基底類別的組件控制項） (connection controls are unique in that they are not part controls that inherit from the base class)| (直接繼承自) (inherits directly from )| Web 組件控制項中的所有區域都有基本的一般使用者介面項目，並且繼承自基底類別。All zones in the Web Parts control have basic, common user interface elements that they inherit from the base class. 並非所有這些項目會顯示在每個區域中，但每個區域的類型是能夠使這些常見的區域相關 UI 項目下, 表中所述。Not all these elements are visible on every zone, but each zone type is capable of having these common, zone-related UI elements, as described in the following table. |區域區段Zone section|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |頁首Header|區域的上方區段。The top section of a zone. 它包括標頭文字，其中可以包括的標題區域中。區分標頭的樣式屬性 （例如框線或背景的色彩）與區域層級 （由按鈕、 超連結或影像） 的動詞命令的使用者可以按一下來執行可套用到整個區域，例如關閉區域 UI 動作。It includes header text, which can include a title for the zone; style attributes (such as a border or background color) that distinguish the header; and zone-level verbs (represented by buttons, hyperlinks, or images) that users can click to perform UI actions that apply to the entire zone, such as closing a zone. 數個屬性，例如， ，和，與相關聯區域的頁首區域。Several properties, such as , , and , relate to the header area of a zone. 如果在區域中，區域層級動詞和屬性會套用到它們。If there are zone-level verbs in the zone, the and properties apply to them. 請注意，這些兩個動詞屬性會套用至區域層級動詞命令，不以個別的組件控制項包含在此區域中的動詞。Note that these two verb properties apply to zone-level verbs only, not to verbs in the individual part controls contained in the zone. 標頭不會出現在每一種區域中。在通常會出現區域沒有需要具有一般的頁首區域文字與指令動詞，例如關閉的動詞命令。Headers are not present in every type of zone; typically they appear in zones where there is a need to have a common header area with text and a verb, such as a close verb.| |本文Body|主要內容區域區段。The main contents section of a zone. 衍生自每個區域具有主體區段。Every zone that derives from has a body section. 所有類型的集合中的 Web 組件控制項集合、 區域的主體包含指定的型別控制項 （或其他伺服器控制項），對應至區域類型，如上表所示。For all types of zones in the Web Parts control set, the body of the zone contains the designated type of controls (or other server controls) that correspond to a zone type, as indicated in the previous table. 各成員類別會影響內容的 [主體] 區段中，例如， ， ，和屬性。Various members of the class affect the contents of the body section, such as the , , , and properties. [主體] 區段是空的如果可以在某些情況下顯示訊息。If the body section is empty, the message can be displayed in certain situations.| |ChromeChrome|針對每個部分組成的控制項區域中呈現常見 UI 項目。The common UI elements rendered for each part control in a zone. 這是不同的樣式屬性套用至區域本身; 討論chrome 特別適用於包含組件控制項。This is distinct from a discussion of style attributes that apply to the zone itself; chrome applies specifically to the contained part controls. Chrome 包含動詞命令、 框線和背景色彩或字型樣式區域的組件控制項的標題文字，例如其他樣式屬性。Chrome includes verbs, borders, and other style attributes such as background color, or font style of the title text, for a zone's part controls. 區域使用單一色彩物件適用於其所包含的組件控制項類型決定 chrome 詳細資料 (例如物件包含控制項)。A zone determines the chrome details by using a single chrome object appropriate to the type of part controls it contains (e.g., a object for a that contains controls). 此單一 chrome 物件處理 chrome 詳細資料及區域中的所有組件控制項的轉譯。This single chrome object handles the chrome details and the rendering for all the part controls in the zone. 這可讓開發人員建立可在其中指定有一致且一般外觀與風格的所有組件控制項的區域。This enables developers to create zones in which they can specify a consistent, common look and feel for all the part controls. 區域的組件控制項包含與 chrome 的某些屬性， ， ，和屬性。Some properties that relate to the chrome for a zone's part controls include the , , , and properties. 請注意最 chrome 相關的屬性，包括特定的屬性來參考 chrome 物件的區域，特定類型的基底中不會實作類別。Note that most chrome-related properties, including a specific property to reference the chrome object for a particular type of zone, are not implemented in the base class. 相反地，大部分的 chrome 特定功能區域的實作在特定區域類型，視其組件控制項的獨特需求。Instead, most chrome-specific features of zones are implemented on specific zone types as appropriate to the unique needs of their part controls. 請參閱本主題的上表中所列每種區域類型的主題。See the topics for each zone type listed in the previous table of this topic.| |組件控制項Part Controls|位於內部網路區域的主體區段中的控制項。The controls that reside in the body section of a zone. 繼承自每個區域類別包含在對應的一或多個組件控制項類型，其主體區段中，本主題中的上表所示。Every zone that inherits from the class contains in its body section one or more part controls of a corresponding type, as shown in the previous table in this topic. 這些組件控制項表單的主要 UI 的 Web 組件的應用程式。These part controls form the main UI of Web Parts applications. 最區域類型衍生自集合屬性，讓它們參考其所包含的組件控制項，例如屬性類別，而屬性類別。Most zone types that derive from have a collection property that enables them to reference all their contained part controls, such as the property on the class, and the property on the class.| |頁尾Footer|區域底部區段。The bottom section of a zone. 標頭 區段中，例如它不存在於每個類型的區域，但通常會發生在區域。Like the header section, it is not present in every type of zone, but usually occurs in zones. 典型的頁尾區段的內容是 [確定] 的動詞命令或套用動詞命令，例如在頁尾中顯示的動詞命令區域。Typical contents of a footer section are verbs such as an ok verb or an apply verb, which appear in the footer of zones. 某些與頁尾區段相關聯的屬性包括， ， ，和屬性。Some properties that relate to the footer section include the , , , and properties.| 大部分的類別的內容會說明常見 UI 項目，區域的上表中討論。Most of the class's properties are discussed in the preceding table that describes the common UI elements of zones. 類別也有其呈現內容的角色與相關的數種方法。The class also has several methods relating to its role of rendering content. ， ， ，和方法可以全部覆寫提供以程式設計方式控制每個區域的特定區段的轉譯。The , , , and methods can all be overridden to provide programmatic control over the rendering of each specific section of a zone. 例如，如果您想要自訂的目錄中的區域應用程式的所有頁尾區段轉譯，您無法繼承自類別，覆寫方法繼承自，和變更的呈現方式頁尾區段。For example, if you want to customize the rendering of all the footer sections of catalog zones in your application, you could inherit from the class, override the method inherited from , and change the rendering of the footer section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 程式碼範例的第一個部分會顯示兩個自訂控制項衍生自類別。The first part of the code example shows two custom controls that derive from the class. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zonewebparts.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zonewebparts.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二部分顯示的網頁上裝載控制項。The second part of the code example shows a Web page that hosts the controls. 請注意，宣告式標記包含兩個控制項控制項和控制項。Notice that the declarative markup contains two controls, a control and an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zoneoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zoneoverviewvb.aspx#1)] 您可以載入瀏覽器，並查看不同區域的行為方式的不同頁面顯示模式之間切換中的頁面。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different zones behave. 如需有關顯示模式及啟用的使用者，以便在它們之間切換的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

para.span: 您幾乎不需要直接繼承自類別以開發自訂 Web 組件的區域。

span.span: You rarely need to inherit directly from the class to develop custom Web Parts zones.

para.span: Web 組件控制項集合包含上面 < 備註 > 一節所列的特定的區域，通常您可以衍生自其中一個將自訂行為加入至區域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and usually you can derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 如果您決定要直接繼承自類別，您必須覆寫屬性和方法的數字 (請參閱文件的成員類別)。

span.span: If you do decide to inherit directly from the class, you must override a number of properties and methods (see the documentation for the members of the class).

para.span: 您也必須建立自訂控制，您可以選擇自訂控制項來建立唯一的顯示模式，以檢視您的區域和其他自訂，讓您使用 Web 組件控制項集合內的區域。

span.span: You must also create a custom control, optionally a custom control to create a unique display mode in which to view your zone, and other customizations to make your zone work within the Web Parts control set.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string BackImageUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string BackImageUrl
Public Overridable Property BackImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BackImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定區域背景影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a background image for a zone.

value.span: 字串，表示用做區域背景影像的影像 URL。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a background image for the zone.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區域的背景影像會顯示在所有區域的內容會顯示的顯示模式。The background image for a zone is visible in all display modes in which a zone's contents are visible. 如果區域包含組件的控制項，此影像隨即顯示在控制項後面。If a zone contains part controls, the image appears behind the controls. 如果區域不包含控制項，其內容不會轉譯在瀏覽模式中，因此不會顯示的影像。If a zone contains no controls, its contents are not rendered in browse mode, so the image is not displayed. 如果提供的映像小於區域主體，它會並排顯示以涵蓋完整主體區域。If the supplied image is smaller than the body of a zone, it is tiled to cover the full body area. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，有兩個區域中，第二個宣告式標記，``項目為空白。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/CS/zonebackimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/VB/zonebackimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器中，您可以切換到設計模式，以便查看空白區域中的映像。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the image in the empty zone. 請注意，實際的 URL，如屬性未在此範例中提供。Note that an actual URL for the property is not provided in this example. 如需如何變更頁面的詳細資料顯示模式，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string EmptyZoneText { get; set; }
.property instance string EmptyZoneText
Public Overridable Property EmptyZoneText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ EmptyZoneText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定區域不包含控制項時出現的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.

value.span: 字串，包含空白區域中出現的訊息。

span.span: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.

value.span: 預設的特定文化特性字串是由 .NET Framework 所提供。

span.span: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的文字屬性，會出現在區域中沒有控制項區域是其中一種個人化模式，例如編輯、 設計或類別目錄的模式。The text in the property appears when there are no controls in a zone, and the zone is in one of the personalization modes, such as edit, design, or catalog mode. > [!NOTE] > 當區域進入其中一種可讓必須對區域的內容、 個人化變更個人化模式控制集屬性值設定為`true`其中參考的顯示模式物件上屬性。When a zone enters one of the personalization modes that would allow personalization changes to be made to the zone's contents, the control sets the property value to `true` on the display mode object referenced in its property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，有兩個區域中，第二個宣告式標記，``項目為空白。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/CS/zoneemptyzonetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/VB/zoneemptyzonetextvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器中，您可以切換至設計模式，請參閱提供的文字空白區域中顯示的屬性。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the empty zone. 如需如何變更頁面的詳細資料顯示模式，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，如果.NET Framework 無法載入或建立的執行個體控制，執行個體類別會建立並顯示在其所在位置。At run time, if the .NET Framework is unable to load or create an instance of a control, an instance of the class is created and displayed in its place. 此物件包含錯誤訊息，並從的樣式屬性屬性會套用至錯誤訊息。This object contains an error message, and the style attributes from the property are applied to the error message.

summary.span: 取得值，表示區域是否具有頁尾區。

value.span: 如果區域有頁尾區，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性主要由控制項開發人員建立自訂區域。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它做為旗標，以便 Web 組件控制項集合呈現頁尾只在適當區域時存在。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a footer only when appropriate for a zone. 例如，屬性會覆寫這個屬性，並傳回`false`，如此一來，頁尾不會轉譯為控制項。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false`, so that a footer is not rendered for a control. 工具區域 (間接衍生自區域類別藉由類別，例如和) 必須具有頁尾，如此比方說，他們可以例如轉譯通用使用者介面 (UI) 動詞命令按鈕**確定**，**套用**，和**取消**底部的區域。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have footers so that, for example, they can render common user interface (UI) verbs with buttons such as **OK**, **Apply**, and **Cancel** at the bottom of the zone. 因為屬性是`true`根據預設，工具區域不需要覆寫屬性。Because the property is `true` by default, tool zones do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果您要建立自訂的工具區域衍生自，您可以覆寫方法，並提供您的區域頁尾的轉譯。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's footer.

value.span: 如果區域有頁首區，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the zone has a header area; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性主要由控制項開發人員建立自訂區域。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它做為旗標，以便 Web 組件控制項集合呈現的標頭，只在適當區域時存在。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a header only when appropriate for a zone. 例如，屬性會覆寫這個屬性，並傳回`false`除非頁面是在其中一個模式可讓個人化。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false` unless the page is in one of the modes that allow personalization. 標頭未在此情況下，呈現給瀏覽模式，頁首會轉譯在大多數其他模式的控制項。In this case, a header is not rendered for a control in browse mode, while in most other modes a header is rendered. 如需有關顯示模式及啟用的使用者，以便在它們之間切換的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 工具區域 (間接衍生自區域類別藉由類別，例如和) 必須有標頭會顯示只有當頁面處於適當的顯示模式。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have headers that appear only when the page is in the appropriate display mode. 因為屬性是`true`根據預設，它們不需要覆寫屬性。Because the property is `true` by default, they do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果您要建立自訂的工具區域衍生自，您可以覆寫方法，並提供您的區域標頭的轉譯。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's header.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區域的內容網頁進入特定顯示模式時，會顯示屬性。The contents of a zone's property are displayed when a Web page enters certain display modes. 例如，在頁面，具有控制項，指派給文字屬性頁面編輯、 類別目錄或進入設計模式中變成可見。For example, on a page that has a control, the text assigned to the property becomes visible when the page enters edit, catalog, or design mode. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，有兩個區域中，第二個宣告式標記，``項目為空白。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/CS/zoneheadertextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/VB/zoneheadertextvb.aspx#1)] 瀏覽器，您可以將頁面切換至設計模式，請參閱提供的文字區域的頁首區域中顯示的屬性。In a browser, you can switch the page to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the header area of the zone. 如需如何變更頁面的詳細資料顯示模式，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

summary.span: 載入先前儲存的區域狀態資訊。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法載入先前儲存的區域的狀態資訊。The method loads previously saved state information for a zone. 它會覆寫基底方法也載入狀態資訊的各種樣式屬性的區域，例如， ，和。It overrides the base method to also load state information for the various style properties of a zone, such as , , and .

exception.span: 物件的大小不等於目前檢視狀態物件的大小。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法，以防止呈現其父控制項是否另一個區域或組件控制項的區域。The method overrides the base method in order to prevent a zone from rendering if its parent control is another zone or a part control.

exception.span: 控制項在其他區域或 控制項內為巢狀。

span.span: A control is nested within another zone or within a control.

Public Overridable Property Padding As Integer

summary.span: 取得或設定表格的儲存格填補屬性，該表格包含區域的 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the cell padding attributes on the table that contains the controls in a zone.

value.span: 呈現的區域表格中，項目與其儲存格界限之間的填補像素數目。

span.span: The number of pixels for the padding between items and their cell boundaries in the table rendered for a zone.

value.span: 預設值為 2。

span.span: The default is 2.

exception.span: 屬性會設定為小於 -1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than -1.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的內容與此控制項的框線之間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the contents of a control and the border of the control.

value.span: 物件，表示度量類型和邊框距離量。

value.span: 區域的預設邊框距離是 5 像素。

span.span: The default padding for a zone is 5 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來定義每個控制項的內容與區域中包含的所有控制項的框線標準的填補量。Use this property to define a standard padding amount between the content of each control and its border for all controls contained in a zone.

exception.span: 指派給屬性的值為負數。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is a negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style PartChromeStyle { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style PartChromeStyle
Public ReadOnly Property PartChromeStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ PartChromeStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得樣式特性，該樣式特性套用至區域中 Web 組件控制項的框線。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the borders of Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，包含區域中 Web 組件控制項框線的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the borders that surround Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項可以有自己的框線，定義於屬性。A Web Parts control can have its own border, defined in the property. 包含控制項的區域可以新增其他外部控制項周圍框線。The zone that contains the control can add an additional outer border around the control. 區域可以放置每個 Web 組件控制項周圍的外框由屬性。The outer border that a zone can place around each of its Web Parts controls is determined by the property. 這個屬性並不會取消該屬性的屬性中包含 out物件; 它是與合併，還是新增至它們。This property does not cancel out the property attributes contained in the object; it is merged with or added to them. 它可讓要包含 Web 組件控制項的每個提供通用且一致的框線的區域。It enables a zone to provide a common and consistent border for each of the Web Parts controls it contains. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然樣式設定會套用到外框，如果您在設定其他屬性，將可以設定、 包含的控制項周圍的區域的主要這類屬性所參考物件，瀏覽器會解譯與套用到用來呈現一個區域的資料表的所有子元素的樣式屬性。Although the style settings apply primarily to the outer border that a zone can set around the controls it contains, if you set additional properties on the object referenced by the property, such as , the browser interprets those style attributes as applying to all the sub-elements of the table used to render a zone. 因此，設定所參考物件的樣式屬性屬性有相同的效果控制項設定為屬性所參考的物件上屬性。Hence, setting the property for the style object referenced by the property has the same effect on a control as setting the property on the object referenced by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定網頁組件區域中包含的控制項外框線的樣式屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to set style attributes for the outer borders of Web Parts controls contained in a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/CS/zonepartchromestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/VB/zonepartchromestylevb.aspx#1)] 請注意，當您第一次載入瀏覽器中的，上層控制自己綠色的框線寬度為 2 的像素中的宣告式標記頁面所設定。Note that when you first load the page in a browser, the upper control has its own green border with a width of 2 pixels, as set in the declarative markup for the page. 使用者按一下行事曆之後，頁面以程式設計方式變成紅色，這兩個區域中控制項的框線，並設定其框線寬度為 4 像素，但上方控制項會保留其原始的綠色內部框線。After a user clicks the calendar, the page programmatically changes the borders of both controls in the zone to red, and sets their border width to 4 pixels, yet the upper control retains its original green inner border.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType PartChromeType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType PartChromeType
Public Overridable Property PartChromeType As PartChromeType

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType PartChromeType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定區域中架構 Web 組件控制項的框線類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，決定區域中架構 Web 組件控制項的框線類型。

span.span: A that determines the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性作用就像區域中的 Web 組件控制項的預設屬性。The property acts like a default property for the Web Parts controls in a zone. 如果 Web 組件的控制項有其設定屬性，屬性會覆寫的效果屬性在執行階段。If a Web Parts control has its property set, that property overrides the effect of the property at run time. 如果控制項的屬性未設定，或設為，值屬性會決定哪種框線控制項有。If the control's property is not set, or is set to , the value of the property determines what kind of border the control has.

exception.span: 該值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

Public ReadOnly Property PartStyle As TableStyle
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ PartStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得樣式特性，該樣式特性套用至區域中每個 Web 組件控制項的框線和內容。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the border and contents of each Web Parts control contained by a zone.

value.span: ，包含區域中 Web 組件控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the Web Parts controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 樣式屬性會套用至的框線與內容的區域中的每個 Web 組件控制項。The style attributes apply to the border and contents of every Web Parts control in a zone. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 這個屬性可讓您在區域包含的所有控制項的內容提供一致的樣式。This property enables you to provide a consistent style for the contents of all the controls a zone contains. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，在參考中的宣告式標記中，有``項目和``項目與兩個控制項，因為它們是在區域中，做為 Web 組件控制項在執行階段。Note that in the zone referenced in the declarative markup, there is an `` element and an `` element, with both controls acting as Web Parts controls at run time because they are in a zone. 在使用者按一下月曆控制項上的日期之後，頁面以程式設計方式使用屬性來變更該區域中的所有組件控制項的背景色彩為紅色。After the user clicks a date on the calendar control, the page programmatically uses the property to change the background color of all part controls in the zone to red. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/CS/zonepartstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/VB/zonepartstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 如控制項，方法會設定區域會轉譯 HTML 表格的樣式屬性。For a control, the method sets style attributes for the HTML table that is rendered for the zone. 樣式屬性協助呈現 HTML 表格，在支援的瀏覽器中正常運作。The style attributes help render the HTML table properly in supported browsers.
